content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and I received a command to Google for nannies in the Cergy area specializing in alternative pedagogies. The search returned several results, including job postings on Jooble and GreatAuPair, a nanny agency specializing in alternative pedagogies called Peaceful Learning Nanny Agency, and a website called You Are Mom that discusses alternative pedagogies to traditional education. There were also links to Babysits, a website for finding nannies, and Care.com, which has a private concierge nanny service. Additionally, there was a link to a blog post on BookrClass about alternative pedagogies and language learning in 2023.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://alternativenannies.com/", "question": "What is the experience and pedagogical approach of the nannies?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for a nanny agency that provides a holistic approach to childcare, focusing on emotional well-being and gaining trust and respect. The agency offers alternative approaches such as Montessori and Steiner nannies. Testimonials praise the agency for finding nannies with a gentle approach based on knowledge of development and neuroscience. The agency also offers a referral program. Contact information is provided for the USA, UK, and worldwide.\n\nLinks: ['No cost consultation to help you find the best care for your child (https://alternativenannies.com/what-youre-looking-for)', ' (https://alternativenannies.com/)', ' (https://alternativenannies.com/)', 'Home (https://alternativenannies.com/)', 'Our Story (https://alternativenannies.com/our-story)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://alternativenannies.com/", "question": "What are the services offered by the nanny agency?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Human feedback: Cergy is located in France, I repeat the address is 22 avenue de l'orangerie 95800 Cergy, France. It looks like the alternativenanies is a more focused on USA and England nanies.", type='action_result')]
"""
